entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 19 except minus 12 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear except cloudy along parts of the coast this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19 except minus 12 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
